page.title: 15The Games We Play 1
page.content:
The rules of HAD ________________ Number of people: 4 or more One person is 'it'. When 'it' says "go!" everybody runs off while 'it' tries to catch someone. The person who is caught becomes 'it' and the game continues.
The rules of UPS AND DOWNS __________________________ Number of people: 4+ Ups and downs is played on a court with a line at each end. Behind the lines is home. One person is 'it' and they stand in between the lines. Then the remaining people have to run from one home to the other. If 'it' catches them then they are 'it' as well. Thomas Steer Bournehall JMI
